content: I am working on this issue #3877. I have made a subscription button there and this is how it works now. I would like to get some feedback on it in a design perspective. unsubscribed_stream_error_message.gif
We no longer need the "manage your subscriptions on the .." line. So it can be just one line.
Thanks for the feedback. Updated that one. Now, I also gave some space between the button and the margin. Is this looks good or shall we stick with the previous one? pasted image
Are there any other examples where we have a message here with a button? Does the at-all warning have a button?
the x also doesn't look like it's in the right place.
We have a button in the error message when the user mentions another user who is not subscribed to that stream. pasted image
That button is for inviting the user to that stream.
Yeah, we should use the same styling as that; and then possibly clean up the positioning of the x :smiley:
By the Same styling do you mean it should not be in red color? And follows the same color as user mention?

Yeah, I think the same yellow color is good. And we might want to update the explanation to match. "You are not subscribed to this stream. You will not be notified if other users reply to your message."
